wrap;max-width:80rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:2rem;padding-right:2rem}}.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.site-content__layout .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#bdcadb,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase}}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%);transform:translate(-50%);width:auto}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:133.33333%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square              <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/travelers-wait-for-hours-at-bna-valet-parking/">

                </a>
               </h4>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">

                </span>

              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/sports/dolphins-waive-former-titans-1st-round-pick-isaiah-wilson/">
                 Dolphins waive former Titans 1st round pick Isaiah Wilson
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">

                </a>
               </h4>

      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">
       <h2 class="article-list__heading screen-reader-text">
        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806012" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="1 killed in Nashville shooting, suspect on the run" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/crime-tracker/1-killed-in-nashville-shooting-suspect-on-the-run/">
            1 killed in Nashville shooting, suspect on the run
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-0" data-link-label="Crime Tracker" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/crime-tracker/">
            Crime Tracker
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T22:36:18-05:00">
            2 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="https://www.wkrn.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/73/2020/09/shooting-death-investigation-generic.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/crime-tracker/1-killed-in-nashville-shooting-suspect-on-the-run/">

        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805865" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="1">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Vigil held in Nashville to support Asian community after deadly Atlanta spa shootings" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/vigil-planned-in-nashville-to-support-asian-community-after-deadly-atlanta-spa-shootings/">
            Vigil held in Nashville to support Asian community after deadly Atlanta spa shootings
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-1" data-link-label="Local News" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/">
            Local News
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T23:03:03-05:00">
            1 hour ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="https://www.wkrn.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/73/2021/03/ded210d5a1d540ef8a4e207bec12ba55.jpg?w=2560&amp;h=1440&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/vigil-planned-in-nashville-to-support-asian-community-after-deadly-atlanta-spa-shootings/">
           <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
            <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6458325">

        <section class="article-list article-list--headline-two-col" data-context="homepage_top_stories">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched article-list__heading--bottom-divider">
          Top Stories
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806004" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="0">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/travelers-wait-for-hours-at-bna-valet-parking/">
              Travelers wait in line for hours at BNA valet parking
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/">
              Local News
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-03-21T22:22:32-05:00">
              2 hours ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/travelers-wait-for-hours-at-bna-valet-parking/">
             <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
              <div class="image-wrapper square vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6458334">

          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805895" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="8">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/fishing-funtacular/davis-nolans-fishing-funtacular-march-21-2021/">
              Davis Nolan’s Fishing Funtacular March 21, 2021
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/fishing-funtacular/">
              Fishing Funtacular
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-03-21T11:10:58-05:00">
              13 hours ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/fishing-funtacular/davis-nolans-fishing-funtacular-march-21-2021/">

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Local News
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806004" data-collection="article-list3" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/travelers-wait-for-hours-at-bna-valet-parking/">
                Travelers wait in line for hours at BNA valet parking
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/">
                Local News
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T22:22:32-05:00">
                2 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/local-news/travelers-wait-for-hours-at-bna-valet-parking/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6458334">

               <path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z">
               </path>
              </svg>
             </span>
            </a>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">

       </main>

           var accuwxStoryTellerSdkDns = 'polling.storyteller.accuweather.com';
(function(d, s, id) {
    var js, sjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
    if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
    js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
    js.src = '//' + accuwxStoryTellerSdkDns + '/scripts/accuwx-storyteller-sdk.js';

    sjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, sjs);
}(document, 'script', 'accuwx-storyteller-sdk'));

            </a>

       <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-27">
        <section class="article-list article-list--trending" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="" data-context="numbered_list">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--bottom-divider">
          Trending Stories
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="806012" data-collection="article-list10" data-index="0">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/news/crime-tracker/1-killed-in-nashville-shooting-suspect-on-the-run/">
              1 killed in Nashville shooting, suspect on the run
             </a>
            </h3>
           </div>
          </article>
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="805935" data-collection="article-list10" data-index="1">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/community/health/coronavirus/texas-roadhouse-ceo-dies-by-suicide-after-experiencing-unbearable-covid-symptoms/">
              Texas Roadhouse CEO dies by suicide after experiencing ‘unbearable’ COVID symptoms
             </a>
            </h3>
           </div>
          </article>
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="803148" data-collection="article-list10" data-index="2">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list10" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wkrn.com/community/health/coronavirus/restrictions-on-bars-restaurants-to-be-eased-in-nashville-by-next-weekend/">
              Restrictions on bars, restaurants to be eased in Nashville by next weekend
             </a>
            </h3>
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
             <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
              <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <defs>
                <style>
                 .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                </style>
               </defs>
               <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
               </path>
              </svg>
             </span>
             <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
              Video
             </span>
            </span>
           </div>
          </article>

0===l?null:l,f=r[1],g=void 0===f?null:f;s&&g&&(u.setAttribute("width",s),u.setAttribute("height",g))}d.classList.add("ad-unit--is-rendered")}}}}))}))},26:function(t,e,n){"use
